text: Paul Henry Nitze (January 16, 1907 â€“ October 19, 2004) was an American politician. He helped shape Cold War defense policy over the course of many presidential administrations. He helped Ronald Reagan negotiate the INF Treaty. ==Other websites== *Annotated bibliography for Paul Nitze from the Alsos Digital Library for Nuclear Issues *Interview about the SALT I negotiations for the WGBH series War and Peace in the Nuclear Age Category:1907 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:United States Secretaries of the Navy Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
